name: Sunshade, a roguelike prototype
description:
Sunshade is a short, turn-based roguelike for Android. Explore randomly generated worlds and defeat enemies using lots of different items, upgrades and unlockable characters!

This game is a (fully playable!) prototype which I've had very fun making. Right now you you can explore the first area of the game, and loop that area for as long as you want. After working on this project for a month I'm releasing it to get feedback on the core gameplay loop, before I continue and flesh the game out with stuff to do.

Future stuff I have planned for the game is:

  • More unique worlds
  • More enemies and enemy types unique to the different worlds
  • More items and item combinations
  • An optional story

Currently the game is for Android only.  If there is a demand for it, I might make it available for iOS and PC too.

Thanks to Tom Jerbo for help with the pathfinding!
